author: Jon Brodkin
title: Trump claims “total authority” to override governors, force states to reopen
description: States say they will follow science and evidence, not Trump.
content:
21 with 18 posters participating
President Donald Trump today falsely claimed he has "total" authority to override governors and force states to reopen their economies despite the ongoing coronavirus pandemic.
Trump faced numerous questions from reporters a… [+4357 chars]
